title: Bug 50550: PropFind 404 error after MkCol success
OB: A PropFind call on a resource returns a 404 error when executed after an MkCol for the same resource.
EB: The request for the PropFind method on a resource results in a 404 error, indicating that the resource could not be found. This occurs when the PropFind method is executed after an MkCol method for the same resource.
SR: To resolve this issue, the PropFind method should return the expected response without a 404 error when executed after an MkCol method for the same resource.
